alert.note: Alert for Durham; Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 3:46PM EDT until September 08 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Wake County in central North Carolina... Southeastern Durham County in central North Carolina... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 346 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fuquay-Varina, or 9 miles southeast of Cary, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Raleigh, Durham, Cary, Wake Forest, Garner, Fuquay-Varina, RDU International, Apex, Holly Springs and Morrisville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
